text: - Telkomsel is the largest

telecommunication service
provider in Indonesia.
We have more than 150 million customers.

Cloud transformation
become a critical part
of our overall business strategy,
and as every transformation,
people is the critical part of it.

And for this, we need help
from the AWS Skills Guild Team.

So CloudZone is our cloud
community of practice

that foster the culture
of collaborative learning
and also innovation mindset.
In addition to regular training programs,
right, formal, informal hands-on learning,

we also conduct yearly
hackathon activities.
Since 2021, we already have

thousands participant
attending AWS training
and certification program.

Right, by having this,
we create an environment

where our employee can
participate directly in innovation

and also, it's creating
safe place for them

to create more ideas and
also take more risks.
After migrating our front-end application,
digital application, to the cloud,
we see some benefit that it give
better experience to our customers.
And we can see the real benefit
in term of the number of subscribers
in one of our mobile applications.
It's increased almost 175%,
so it's quite significant numbers.
